availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Christopher G. Lowdenback (Owen County, Kentucky, farmer agent.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer agent. Kentucky native. Married to Rachel Lowdenback. Father of Margaret A. Lowdenback and Mary F. Lowdenback. Farmer agent in Owen County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 79.
Find A Grave, "Christopher G. Lowdenback (1 Feb 1825-13 Apr 1903)," Memorial #111133119, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/111133119 (accessed June 17, 2020).
